org.codemonkey.javareflection
Class ExternalClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      org.codemonkey.javareflection.ExternalClassLoader

public final class ExternalClassLoader
extends ClassLoader

A toolkit that can read and compile .java sourcefiles on the fly in runtime. This class loader caches loaded classes for repeated requests. Also, if a .class file already exists for a specific .java sourcefile, the classloader will compare dates and see if the .java needs recompiling.

A basepath can be specified for the classloader to look in for sourcefiles.

See Also:
ClassLoader.loadClass(String)

findClass

public final Class<?> findClass(String className)
                         throws ClassNotFoundException
Loads a classfile from file in the following order:
  1. looks for the java source and if available, checks whether it needs to be compiled
  2. if no .java or .class file found, try to find it in the VM
If the class ultimately wasn't found a ClassNotFoundException is being thrown. If class was found, but an error occurred, store exception for later review and return null. This is done so because the overridden method can't throw an exception other than ClassNotFoundException.

Overrides:
findClass in class ClassLoader
Parameters:
className - The path and name to the classfile.
Returns:
The requested class reference.
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException

setBasepath

public void setBasepath(String basepath)
Sets the base path this classloader will look for classes in.

Parameters:
basepath - A folder path to look for classes.

getBasepath

public String getBasepath()
Returns:
basepath
